Package gui

Class GUIObject

java.lang.Object
gui.Objects.GUIObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
GUIRectangle, GUIString
public class GUIObject
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the superclass of all other GUIObjects. Properties all GUIObjects need are defined here, such as their position, dimensions and ids.

    • isInGUIObject

      public boolean isInGUIObject​(int x, int y)
      Check if the given coordinates collide with the position off this object
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
      Returns:
      true if the given position collides with the position off the object
